note.snippet: Ratto duṭṭho ca yaṃ kayirā, na taṃ kayirā tato puna

note.original: sirī ca tāta lakkhī ca (syā. pī.)
so tvaṃ sabbesaṃ suhadayo (syā. pī.), so tvaṃ sabbe suhadayo (ka.)

note.snippet: ‘‘Taṃ balānaṃ balaṃ seṭṭhaṃ, aggaṃ paññābaṃ balaṃ
Suciṇṇena divaṃ pattā, mā dhammaṃ rāja pāmado

note.original: idaṃ padaṃ natthi (sī. syā. pī. potthakesu)

note.snippet: Koṇḍañña eso manujesu dhammo, yaṃ vuddha
Pabbato anuruddho ca, kaccāyano ca devalo
Tāsampi hotu pariyāyo, tāpi yantu palobhanā’’
‘‘Araññe me viharato, yo me tejā ha sambhutaṃ
Kathaṃ nu vittāni pahāya bhoge, pabbaji nikkhamma gharā sapañña’’
hi no bhakkho ayaṃ manāpo, bahū ca no uragā bhuttapubbā
‘‘Annañca pānañca pasannacitto, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adāsiṃ
Acchādanaṃ seyyamathannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha
‘‘Na me bhayaṃ anvagataṃ mahantaṃ, tejo na sakkā mama tehi hantuṃ
Siriyā paññāya ca bhāvitosi, kiṃ patthayaṃ
mātū ca pitū agāre, putto piyo paṭivihito vaseyya
‘‘Abhumme kathaṃ nu bhaṇasi, sallaṃ me deva urasi kappesi
Mañjūhi sabbehipi tumhehi, cirampi ṭhatvā vināsabhāvo’’

note.original: ghātemi kaṃ avajjhaṃ (pī.), taṃ avajjhaṃ ghātemi (ka.)

note.snippet: Hatthepi te gahessaṃ, na hi gacchasi

note.original: ko nu me iminā attho (sī. syā.), ko nu me nattho (pī.)
taṃ deva te dadāmi sabbampi (sī.), taṃ te dadāmi sabbaṃ (pī.)

note.snippet: Mā vo kāmā haniṃsu, rammaṃ hi
